sentences.en: Before NHI, 10 patients had incomplete treatment, mainly because of unaffordable medical fees.
sentences.cn: 在全民健康保险实施之前, 有10位病人无法接受完整的治疗, 主要是无法负担医疗费用.

sentences.en: Eliminate the unaffordable interest - rate subsidy.
sentences.cn: 消除不可负担的利率补贴.

sentences.en: They misallocated capital, with amounts going into housing that was ultimately unaffordable.
sentences.cn: 他们错误地把大量借款分配给了最终偿付不起还款的房地产.

sentences.en: We must also address the forces making the healthcare system unaffordable and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 我们还必须应对那些令医疗体系变得无法负担和效率低下的因素.

sentences.en: You have to become awfully large to be unaffordable -- there's lots of cash, lots of capital out there for acquisitions.
sentences.cn: 制药业者坐拥很多现金,进行收购的资本雄厚,你必须变成让人买不起的超大公司.
